--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Wildrider puts another good piece into Astrotrain. "Only take what 
can
> be used guys." he mentions. He then continues, "Why so glum, you 
need a
> bit of conflict in your life, or you ain't a con." he says with his 
sick
> smirk again.



::Domnijoe and Blindchaos::

    Wildrider gets a glare so acidic it could corrode metal. It lasts 
a nanno then is replaced by a softer, but still angry, stare.
    "Yessir." she says mockingly, saluting sarcasticly. There is a 
pause, then she bursts into a fit of laughter. 
    "Alright. You got me." She says. "Conflict IS the Decepticon 
way..." she looks around at the wreakage, a concentrated scowel on
her 
face. "If I can find them, I'll grab the energon storage skins. They 
were the only things on the ship that didn't rust or need repairing." 
    Before she gets up to dig through what was the back of the ship, 
she flings a large, sharp chunk of metal at Blindchaos. The male 
Decepticon yelps with surprise.
    "Slag heap." she snaps at him.
    Blindchaos, recovering from his shock, sighs. He then continues 
his work, his grin never fading.
    

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
********************************
